text: Abdur Rashid Sarkar is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Gaibandha-2. ==Career== Sarkar was elected to parliament from Gaibandha-2 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1991 and June 1996. He contested the 2018 election from Gaibandha-2 as a Bangladesh Nationalist Party candidate after failing to get the Jatiya Party nomination. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:7th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Abdur Rashid Sarkar
